custom_css.gtk4:
/*\ = Aliases = \*/

   @define-color
      alpha   @accent_color ; @define-color
      beta    @borders /*/ for High Contrast Mode /*/ ; @define-color
      omega   @destructive_color

/*\-------------+
 #    Asides    #
 +-------------\*/

;  box
+  separator.sidebar
+  box
,  .sidebar-pane
,  .navigation-sidebar
   {  color
      :  @view_fg_color ; background :
         @view_bg_color

}  box
+  separator.sidebar
+  box
      headerbar
,  .sidebar-pane
      headerbar
,  .navigation-sidebar
      headerbar
   {  color
      :  @card_fg_color ; background :
         @card_bg_color

/*\--------------+
 #    Anchors    #
 +--------------\*/

}  link
,  button.link
   >  label
   {  background-image : linear-gradient(
         #0000 calc(100% - 6px)
      ,  alpha(@beta , .6) 0
   ); background-size : 100% calc(1em + 6px)

/*\ = Overrides = \*/

   ;  line-height : 1em
   ;  background-origin : content-box
   ;  background-clip : content-box

}  link
,  button.link
,  button.link
   >  label
   {  text-decoration : none /*/ from Adwaita /*/

/*\------------------------+
 #    Buttons & Toggles    #
 +------------------------\*/

}  button.suggested-action
,  switch
   {  box-shadow : inset 0 0 0
         1px @alpha

}  button.opaque
   {  box-shadow : inset 0 0 0
         1px @beta

}  button.destructive-action
   {  box-shadow : inset 0 0 0
         1px @omega

/*\-------------+
 #    Inputs    #
 +-------------\*/

}  textview
,  label
,  entry
,  spinbutton
   {  caret-color : @alpha /*/ from Adwaita /*/

/*\---------------+
 #     Checks     #
 +----------------+
 | Read <//uxmovement.com/forms/why-radio-buttons-and-checkboxes-cant-co-exist>
 | to understand. |
 +---------------\*/

}  :not(.selection-mode)
   >  check , :not(.selection-mode)
   >  radio
   {  border-radius : 4px
   ;  transform : rotateZ(-.125turn)
   ;  -gtk-icon-transform : rotateZ(.125turn)

}  check:checked
,  radio:checked
   {  -gtk-icon-source : -gtk-icontheme(
         'object-select-symbolic'
